meanings.definition: Comic strips or cartoons in newspapers or magazines.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the funnies in the newspaper every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: The funnies in the magazine always make me laugh.
meanings.sent3: The funnies in the paper had a silly joke that made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The colorful funnies in the comic section brighten up my day.
meanings.sent5: The funnies with the talking animals are my favorite part of the newspaper.

meanings.definition: Something that is amusing or entertaining.
meanings.sent1: Watching comedy shows always brings out the funnies in me.
meanings.sent2: The funnies at the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent3: His funny dance moves were the funnies of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her witty remarks were the funnies that kept the conversation lively.
meanings.sent5: The funnies in the movie made it a delightful experience for everyone.
